item.title: Concurrency Control In Databases
item.description: In this post we will talk about concurrency control in databases will discuss various types including MVCC.

item.title: The First Post
item.description: So finally I’m here, after so much hesitation and procrastinating things I finally got to write my first post, Ya it’s a hello post and there’s nothing special about it and probably I would be the only person reading this, but I consider this as my most important post because here, my endless searches end, For those who wanted to start there blog, I have just one suggestion “JUST DO IT”.
